markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mistsoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2607) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a connection to vaporous forms of water, such as fog and mist. You gain the Mist Blending reaction.

 **Mist Blending** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([undine](/Traits.aspx?ID=314)) **Trigger** A creature attempts a flat check to target you because you're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) due to fog, haze, mist, or smoke; **Effect** You shroud yourself in mist, making it harder for your foe to hit you. If you're concealed, the DC of the flat check increases from 5 to 7; if you're hidden, it increases from 11 to 13.
name: Mistsoul

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Mistsoul Source Ancestry Guide pg. 118 2.0 --- You have a connection to vaporous forms of water, such as fog and mist. You gain the Mist Blending reaction. Mist Blending Reaction (undine) Trigger A creature attempts a flat check to target you because you're concealed or hidden due to fog, haze, mist, or smoke; Effect You shroud yourself in mist, making it harder for your foe to hit you. If you're concealed, the DC of the flat check increases from 5 to 7; if you're hidden, it increases from 11 to 13.
